=== Parametrized Scenarios

icon:check-square[role=green] 4 Successful, icon:exclamation-circle[role=red] 1 Failed, icon:ban[role=silver] 0 Pending, 5 Total (58ms)

// tag::scenario-failed[]

==== A scenario with many cases

icon:exclamation-circle[role=red] (50ms)

+++This scenario shows how large case tables are shown in JGiven. As soon as a table has more than 2 entries, grouping by values is possible. This scenario also has some failing steps for demonstration purposes.<p>Btw. this description was created with the <a target='_blank' href='http://jgiven.org/javadoc/com/tngtech/jgiven/annotation/ExtendedDescription.html'>@ExtendedDescription</a> annotation+++

Tags: _FailingOnPurpose_

[unstyled.jg-step-list]
* [.jg-intro-word]*Given* some group value [.jg-argument]*<grouping>*

* [.jg-intro-word]*And* another value [.jg-argument]*<value>*

.Cases
[.jg-casesTable%header,cols="h,1,1,>1"]
|===
| # | grouping | value | Status
| 1 | some grouping value 0 | value 0 | SUCCESS
| 2 | some grouping value 0 | value 1 | SUCCESS
| 3 | some grouping value 0 | value 2 | SUCCESS
| 4 | some grouping value 0 | value 3 | SUCCESS
| 5 | some grouping value 0 | value 4 | SUCCESS
| 6 | some grouping value 0 | value 5 | FAILED
| 7 | some grouping value 0 | value 6 | SUCCESS
| 8 | some grouping value 0 | value 7 | SUCCESS
| 9 | some grouping value 0 | value 8 | SUCCESS
| 10 | some grouping value 0 | value 9 | SUCCESS
| 11 | some grouping value 1 | value 0 | SUCCESS
| 12 | some grouping value 1 | value 1 | SUCCESS

// tag::scenario-successful[]

==== Cases can have custom descriptions

icon:check-square[role=green] (1ms)

===== Case 1 This is the first case

====
description = This is the first case, value = true
====

[unstyled.jg-step-list]
* [.jg-intro-word]*Given* the power light [.jg-argument]_is_ on

===== Case 2 This is another case

====
description = This is another case, value = false
====

[unstyled.jg-step-list]
* [.jg-intro-word]*Given* a machine that is [.jg-argument]_on_

// end::scenario-successful[]

// tag::scenario-successful[]

==== Custom descriptions of cases appear as a separate column in the data table

icon:check-square[role=green] (1ms)

[unstyled.jg-step-list]
* [.jg-intro-word]*Given* the power light [.jg-argument]*<value>* on

.Cases
[.jg-casesTable%header,cols="h,1,1,>1"]
|===
| # | Description | value | Status
| 1 | This is the first case | is | SUCCESS
| 2 | This is another case | is not | SUCCESS
|===

// end::scenario-successful[]

// tag::scenario-successful[]

==== Multiple cases are reported if a data table cannot be generated

icon:check-square[role=green]

===== Case 1

====
value = true
====

[unstyled.jg-step-list]
* [.jg-intro-word]*Given* the power light [.jg-argument]_is_ on

===== Case 2

====
value = false
====

[unstyled.jg-step-list]
* [.jg-intro-word]*Given* a machine that is [.jg-argument]_on_

// end::scenario-successful[]

// tag::scenario-successful[]

==== Parameter values with very long text are truncated in the html report

icon:check-square[role=green] (4ms)

[unstyled.jg-step-list]
* [.jg-intro-word]*Given* a very long parameter value [.jg-argument]*<x>*

.Cases
[.jg-casesTable%header,cols="h,1,1,>1"]
|===
| # | Description | x | Status
| 1 | 1 |  | SUCCESS
| 2 | 2 |  | SUCCESS
|===

// end::scenario-successful[]
